local_intent: Approach and align to t_block, then set and verify yaw at 90 deg to prepare for contact.
assumptions: 90-degree yaw is the desired orientation before contact
coherence_with_global: Matches the perceive→approach/align→act→verify slice before contact: scan and check visibility, align on t_block, set TCP yaw to 90 and verify orientation as in the GLOBAL_BT pre-contact sequence.
